subject: p15518538
History: Nausea and vomiting and EKG changes with widened mediastinum.
Findings: In comparison with study of, the width of the mediastinum has decreased. The cardiac silhouette is within normal limits. Minimal atelectasis at the left base but no vascular congestion or acute focal pneumonia.
